attributes.action: Enforce stricter regulation on vehicle insurers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is a well known fact that insurance companies these days get away with murder. Even if you are involved in an accident that was not your fault, insurance companies are still within their right to penalise you upon renewal. 

It is our belief that the proliferation of uninsured drivers is in part because of the extortionate fees insurance companies charge, and can get away with.

I.e an 18 year old new driver, with no convictions, claims or accidents, can still expect to pay upwards of £1000pa for a vehicle with an engine size of less than 1.4 litres.
